pfizerFacts.description: Approval of Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine in Canada
pfizerFacts.title: Canada Approval

pfizerFacts.description: Sandra Lindsay, a critical care nurse from Northwell Long Island Jewish Medical Center was the first vaccinated in New York
pfizerFacts.title: 1st Pfizer Vaccine shot in US

pfizerFacts.description: Approval of Pfizer/BioNTech vaccine in EU
pfizerFacts.title: EU Approval

pfizerFacts.description: Pfizer/BioNTech announced that their vaccine is highly effective in adolescents 12 to 15 years old
pfizerFacts.title: Highly effective in adolescents

pfizerFacts.description: Wawrzyniak Twins, last of the current generation, are born
pfizerFacts.title: Sara J. Wawrzyniak & Thomas M. Wawrzyniak

pfizerFacts.description: Joe and Sarah expecting a little girl, first member of the next generation of Wawrzyniaks in this branch of the family.
pfizerFacts.title: Baby Wawrzyniak due

pfizerTimeline.description: A new generation of Wawrzyniaks begins.
pfizerTimeline.title: Generation G+1

otherVaccines.description: Moderna (along with Pfizer) uses a new vaccine approach involving messenger RNA
otherVaccines.title: Moderna trials start

otherVaccines.description: The vaccine is being developed by Janssen Pharmaceutica, a Belgium-based division of Johnson & Johnson
otherVaccines.title: Johnson and Johnson trials start

otherVaccines.description: Vaccine developed by a small biotech firm in US
otherVaccines.title: Novavax trials start

otherVaccines.description: US pauses J&J vaccine over clot reports
otherVaccines.title: Johnson and Johnson vaccine paused
